I was being way too compromised. I felt uncomfortable having to smile in someone's face when I really didn't like them or know them well enough to like.
author: Lauryn Hill

title: I played the violin my whole life. I wanted to play from the time I was just a little kid, and I've always loved dance as well. I wanted to make people smile. I wanted to add an extra energy to my playing and make it visual and make it unique and fun.
author: Lindsey Stirling

title: I don't get dressed for other people. I get dressed for what I see in the mirror. My body isn't for other people's consumption. If I smile when I look in the mirror, then great. Let's start the day.
author: Nicole Byer

title: I've had more ups than downs in my career. All you can do is keep working. You still have to take enjoyment out of what you're doing, and things will turn, and my smile has always been there. In good moments and bad.
author: Eden Hazard

title: The bat is gone, but the smile remains.
author: Willie Stargell

title: One study found that people who smile in childhood photographs are less likely to get a divorce.
author: Jenna McCarthy

title: Mind you, physical training doesn't necessarily mean going to an expert for advice. One doesn't have to make a mountain out of a molehill. Get out in the fresh air and walk briskly - and don't forget to wear a smile while you're at it. Don't over-do. Take it easy at first and build on your effort day by day.
author: Douglas Fairbanks

title: I will tell you with 100 percent confidence, Jon Jones is not deep in my head. The fact he actually thinks that, it makes me smile every day.
author: Daniel Cormier

title: She felt like a chess player who, by the clever handling of his pieces, sees the game taking the course intended. Her eyes were bright and tender with a smile as they glanced up into his; and her lips looked hungry for the kiss which they invited.
author: Kate Chopin

title: It's a blessing because the Baldwin vibe on the street is what I live for the most. I think our name is something that a lot of people get a good feeling about and brings a smile to their face, and we're very fortunate.
author: Stephen Baldwin

title: Once you don't smile on film, they say, 'Let's have that bloke who doesn't smile.'
author: Richard C. Armitage

title: It takes both courage and talent to stand up in front of fellow human beings and make them crack a smile, and at the same time keep it clean.
author: Ray Comfort

title: The appreciative smile, the chuckle, the soundless mirth, so important to the success of comedy, cannot be understood unless one sits among the audience and feels the warmth created by the quality of laughter that the audience takes home with it.
author: James Thurber

title: I just like to see people smile.
author: Kane Brown

title: Jessica Simpson is the youth ambassador for Operation Smile, and an episode of The Apprentice featured a team managing a charity concert she put on. Donald Trump came on stage and pledged a donation.
author: Roma Downey

title: Standing as a witness in all things means being kind in all things, being the first to say hello, being the first to smile, being the first to make the stranger feel a part of things, being helpful, thinking of others' feelings, being inclusive.
author: Margaret D. Nadauld

title: Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
author: Vanilla Ice

title: From 1975-'79, I worked for PGA professional Tony Bruno. For five years I watched, lost in admiration, as Tony ran the golf shop at Battleground Country Club in Manalapan, N.J. Tony put in 80-hour weeks doing what nearly 29,000 men and women club pros do every day: Keeping the game alive with a smile.
author: Jim Nantz

title: A tip for looking 'picture perfect' is probably a smile. I think everyone looks better when they are happy; you give off a glow - or at least that is what my mum would say!
author: Amber Le Bon

title: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do.
author: Trent Franks

title: I will have my publicist pull pictures of the way I look at events so I can see, 'Oh, that cut is not as flattering as I thought,' or 'I should smile bigger,' or 'That positioning is odd.' I learn from it.
author: Allison Williams

title: When my company does a good job, we make people happy. They laugh, they smile, they have a good time - that's what we do for a living. Any business doing that is making a noble effort.
author: Jon Taffer

title: I wake up every day with a smile - I'm a blessed man, and every day is special.
author: Taboo

title: Very few things are totally devoid of any possibility of humor. If you are aware of that possibility and alive to the scene becoming that way, then it just happens naturally. That's what I feel living is like, too. I find a lot of things that make me smile or make me laugh over the course of the day.
author: Tom Drury

title: Some people would rather have a lie that makes them smile than a truth that makes them cry. I'm the opposite; I'd rather have people make me cry with the truth than try to make me smile.
author: Joyce Giraud

title: Whenever I look at a baby or children in general, I smile and just want to play with them.
author: Odeya Rush

title: Many people say I smile more in Africa than in Sweden.
author: Henning Mankell

title: As soon as you 'Botox' your smile lines away, you lose part of your identity.
author: Nigel Barker

title: There is not a soul who does not have to beg alms of another, either a smile, a handshake, or a fond eye.
author: John Dalberg-Acton

title: I am so saddened and grossed out by young women who look like creepy, old aliens because of their new Barbie noses and lips. Is that a smile or a grimace?
author: Olivia Wilde

title: It is a great day anytime I can bring a smile to a girl or boy, knowing that I am helping to inspire them to always dream big.
author: Normani Kordei

title: To this day, the first thing that I do every morning is look in the mirror. I'll tell myself, 'Look at your skin. Look at your teeth and your smile. You are beautiful.'
author: Khoudia Diop

title: It doesn't all have to be about giving money. Sometimes it's a smile that changes the life of one little kid.
author: Masai Ujiri

title: I have always worked hard. The only thing missing was a smile from Lady Luck.
author: Vidyasagar

title: Tanzanians are some of the friendliest you'll ever meet, insisting on a welcoming smile and wave as they pass you on the streets, exclaiming 'Jambo!'
author: Jodi Balfour

title: Joy's smile is much closer to tears than laughter.
author: Victor Hugo

title: I'm always trying to make myself laugh. I'm the most enthusiastic audience I'm likely to find, so if it doesn't make me smile then it probably won't work on you. The jokes that only make me shrug get cut.
author: Victor LaValle

title: I used to rely on black-and-white, and while I was working on 'Smile,' I learned to adapt to color on my end.
author: Raina Telgemeier

title: My smile has been my ticket to the world. Smiling releases the same feel-good hormones you get jogging. Caring for your lips and gums is important. I brush my teeth morning and night, alternating toothpaste brands. In addition to flossing, I use a Water Pik to massage my gums and remove food particles.
author: Christie Brinkley

title: I've just got a really bad smile. I go for the scowl instead.
author: Jason Statham

title: It's addicting, beating the heck out of people and eating hot dogs and making people smile. I do feel like garbage afterwards, but so what? Most people feel like garbage after a long day of work.
author: Joey Chestnut

title: I love to smile, even through pain.
author: Victoria Arlen

title: For me, the driving force is the audience, and the day that stops, I will stop doing films. The day a part of me stops feeling like putting a smile on someone else's face or if I feel like I don't want to entertain anymore, then I will pack up and leave.
author: Varun Dhawan

title: Sometimes, a nice smile can make up for anything, like when you can't get into an outfit comfortably.
author: Heart Evangelista

title: I thought, 'It doesn't matter what that woman is wearing,' but then I realised actually it's our job as designers to make women smile; to bring them the chocolate without the calories.
author: Alber Elbaz

title: When I've had to edit my albums, I'll listen to it one time through, and I'll make edits. I want to remember to set up a camera to record myself listening to my set, because I don't even slightly crack a smile, I am just listening for technical details, and I look like somebody that has absolutely no sense of humor. I look insane.
author: Tig Notaro

title: I'm always proud to be popular with the fans. I try to smile and do my best. If they like it, it's even better.
author: Antoine Griezmann

title: I'm not proud of it, but I'm a great liar when I travel. I smile and lie, and things are smooth.
author: Paolo Bacigalupi

title: Deep down inside, when I come to the ring, whether it's a non-televised event or TV or pay per view, deep down inside, when you hear those 'R-K-O' chants or those 'Orton' chants, you know, it makes me smile on the inside.
author: Randy Orton

title: I guess you go back to the old writer's adage that when they do your stuff in Hollywood, you smile sweetly upon your credit - if there is one - and enjoy the show.
author: Chris Claremont

title: Your Shawn Michaels can lose his smile, and he's so afraid of me, he comes out and hands me his belt. Spineless!
author: Shane Douglas

title: You'll never see me in an airport without a DDP YOGA shirt. It says, 'It Ain't Your Mama's Yoga' on the back and 'DDP YOGA' in the front. Every time I walk around, people see the shirt, and it makes them smile.
author: Diamond Dallas Page

title: I love kids a lot. I love to spend time with them. They give me the energy to live, and I would love to bring a smile on their faces.
author: Amruta Khanvilkar

title: On the red carpet, one tip is to suck in your cheekbones - apparently it looks better on camera. I don't know, though; I think a nice smile is best.
author: David Harewood

title: I've got soft features, curly hair with blonde bits and dimples. People think of me as a singer, an entertainer, someone who's always there with a ready smile.
author: Michael Ball

title: Give yourself ten years of failing with a smile on your face. If, after ten years, you still have the passion, you're heading to success!
author: Walshy Fire

title: You try to bring a smile to people's faces, and try to tell people of the adventure you've been on, the success you've had and what it takes.
author: Mike Phelan

title: You keep shooting. You hope it goes in, and you smile.
author: Teemu Selanne

title: I can retire from football with a smile on my face.
author: John Matuszak

title: I travel around the world, experiencing every language, every religion... some places where there's just no reason to smile, because their lives are so difficult.
author: Lionel Richie

title: I don't want to say it myself, but Gautam is a very good-looking boy. He has my eyes and Mahesh's smile.
author: Namrata Shirodkar

title: There are those who believe that the value of a children's book can be measured only in terms of the moral lessons it tries to impose or the perfect role models it offers. Personally, I happen to think that a book is of extraordinary value if it gives the reader nothing more than a smile or two. In fact, I happen to think that's huge.
author: Barbara Park

title: If you're in my shoes, and your goal is to leave people with the biggest possible smile on their face, then doing the meet-and-greet afterwards makes sense.
author: Mick Foley

title: I've told several writers this, and, again, I get back to it, but if you want to make God smile, tell him your plans.
author: Vin Scully

title: I love making people smile and laugh.
author: Varun Sharma

title: In case you haven't heard, my girlfriends and I have declared the summer of 2012 as the best summer ever. The best way to document said 'best summer ever' is with a good ol' disposable camera. Smile, click, move on! Nobody gets pic approval, and there's no time wasted gathering around the camera to analyze a moment that just happened.
author: Candice Accola

title: Evangelicals always assume that humor and faith are contradictory. It's OK to smile, to be nice, but not frivolous.
author: Mike Yaconelli

title: People wonder why I smile a lot. It is because I am doing what I love best: to play football for people who love me. It makes me happy.
author: Robinho

title: A smile and good energy. They will take you farther than any material possession.
author: Caroline Ghosn

title: I wake up each and every day with a smile on my face knowing I get to do something musically.
author: Two Chainz

title: Clinton's hands remain incredibly clean, don't they, and Tony Blair's smile remains as wide as ever. I view these guises with profound contempt.
author: Harold Pinter

title: I used to cry on planes. I don't anymore. It probably took almost a hundred agonizing flights to get there. Now, when I take off, a smile quivers on the corner of my lips.
author: Zazie Beetz

title: I love Jesus Christ with all my heart and everything He stands for. I think that sums up everything that I want for my life, everything I want for my family, everything I want for my career. I want it to be entertaining. I want people to smile and tap their toes, but I want it to be meaningful when the day is done.
author: Josh Turner

title: I just feel like people like a little break. Especially at 12:37 at night, you go, like, 'I'm just tired of the snarky right now. I just want to lie down and have somebody make me laugh for an hour. Entertain me, and then I'm going to sleep with a smile on my face.' That's my job; that's what I do.
author: Jimmy Fallon

title: In general, men are wired to notice obvious signs that convey interest in mating - a warm smile, for example - and ignore other subtleties, like if your lipstick is faded.
author: Helen Fisher

title: Don't let people see when you're mad - just smile and laugh.
author: Astro

title: The person that's always talkin', you don't have to worry about that person. The person that while you're in his face, he's just lookin' at you with a smile on his face, that's the guy you worry about.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

title: If I buy a Fiat Uno, I'll read that, for a man like me, a Ferrari was more suitable. If instead I buy a Ferrari, they'll write that I should have kept my feet on the ground and bought a Fiat. If I smile, I'm not serious. If I don't smile, I'm a rich sulker that doesn't enjoy having the most beautiful job in the world.
author: Mario Balotelli

title: You get somebody to crack a smile, that's a beautiful thing.
author: Tracy Morgan

title: Now, in the Liefeld household, I don't tend to share the fact that I created Deadpool with my kids, so when all the video games started coming out where Wade was at the center of them, I couldn't help but smile.
author: Rob Liefeld

title: I'm so envious of that genetic wiring that immediately puts a smile on your face. My genetic wiring just puts creases in my eyebrows.
author: Chris Pine

title: My theory is, if you force yourself to smile enough, then you start to feel it. Which comes in handy all the time.
author: Erika Christensen

title: Scarlett Johansson has a smile she tries to suppress in every movie she makes. She's been trying to keep a straight face since she appeared with Bill Murray 11 years ago in her breakthrough, 'Lost in Translation.'
author: Steve Erickson

title: Laughter is regional: a smile extends over the whole face.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

title: I love to see the smiles on people's faces when you cook for them. I love to go to different restaurants. I want to cook because I know this acting isn't going to last forever, and I want something to fall back on. It's another way to make people smile.
author: Raven-Symone

title: Giving back is the right thing to do, whether it's donating clothing or even just a smile to someone who needs it.
author: Becky G

title: Cooking is what I do professionally and it is my way of life, but it is also the way I relax. It is the thing I dream about the most; it makes me smile.
author: John Torode

title: Jeff Kinney is tall and has a great smile, but don't be fooled, he's as slick as they come. A real player. And how he came up with a book that appeals to kids ages 8-13 baffles me. He's an unbelievably kind man with a great family.
author: Rachael Harris

title: I'm a clown, which could be a public health role. I'm really interested in moving our society away from a society needing Xanax and Prozac, and that is really feeling depressed, to one that is celebrating, and so I find just walking around in colorful clothes, people smile.
author: Patch Adams

title: I'm a happy guy. I just want to see people laugh and smile.
author: Gerry Cooney

title: Empathy is the faculty to resonate with the feelings of others. When we meet someone who is joyful, we smile. When we witness someone in pain, we suffer in resonance with his or her suffering.
author: Matthieu Ricard

title: I live to leave somebody with a positive experience when they've met me, and make someone smile for the day.
author: Dolph Ziggler

title: To you wives who are constantly complaining and see only the dark side of life, and feel that you are unloved and unwanted, look into your own hearts and minds. If there is something wrong, turn about. Put a smile on your faces. Make yourselves more attractive. Brighten your outlook.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

title: I want to make a lot of people smile.
author: Kyle

title: If you see a kid who's not having the best day, you can make the day better just by giving him a smile. Or her.
author: Jacob Tremblay

title: I smile every time I hear that I'm a fan favorite or a teenage hottie. It is a nice compliment, and the remarks from the fans are great.
author: Sean Berdy

title: More people smile at me now I'm richer.
author: Mo Ibrahim

title: I sat in at every club in New York City, jamming with musicians, because it felt right - and because it felt right and we were having fun - the people dancing and sipping their drinks in the clubs felt it too and it made them smile.
author: Ray Conniff

title: In the U.S., women smile more than men. In the U.K., there's no difference between men and women.
author: Rana el Kaliouby

title: 'Try Again' - every time I hear that song, it just brings a smile to your face. When you're feeling like crap, and you hear, 'Dust yourself off and try again,' it kind of just puts you in a different mindset, 100 percent.
author: Alexandra Shipp

title: I was walking around legally blind. Now I have 20-20 vision. I can't believe I spent so many years blurry, but I think that coincides with how I was feeling. Now I notice if people are watching me, but I also smile right back if someone waves, which helps.
author: Nicole Kidman

title: Oh, I talk about things; I drive my husband insane. And I can't tell a lie. Everyone knows. I do this smile thing.
author: Cecelia Ahern

title: Yes sir, I am a tortured man for all seasons, as they say, and I have powerful friends in high places. Birds sing where I walk, and children smile when they see me coming.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

title: I have always been a flirt. My mother says whe I was a child, I used to stand outside the house and just smile at everyone who walked by. Like, 'Please take me with you!'
author: bell hooks

title: My favorite thing to do as a kid was pretend I was in the opening credits of a sitcom. As the theme song would play, I'd look up at the imaginary camera and smile as my name would flash on the screen.
author: Adam F. Goldberg

title: The only picture I have of my childhood is the picture of me in kindergarten. I have this expression on my face - it's not a smile, it's not a frown. I swear to you, that's the girl who wakes up in the morning and who looks around her house and her life saying, 'I cannot believe how God has blessed me.'
author: Viola Davis

title: Everything about 'UY' is new and fresh, and we are extremely happy at the response from the audiences, as most people are walking out of cinema halls with a smile on their faces.
author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

title: Ten years ago, I still feared loss enough to abandon myself in order to keep things stable. I'd smile when I was sad, pretend to like people who appalled me. What I now know is that losses aren't cataclysmic if they teach the heart and soul their natural cycle of breaking and healing.
author: Martha Beck

title: I love anything to do with kids, anything to better our youth and put a smile on anybody's face is really what I do it for.
author: DeAndre Jordan

title: Beverly Hills is too intimidating. Everyone's got lovely teeth, so you don't want to smile. Everyone's ripped, so you start working out at 4 in the morning and eating egg white omelets.
author: Rob James-Collier

title: We may smile at these matters, but they are melancholy illustrations.
author: Joseph Howe

title: I am a joyful conservative, unafraid to articulate big ideas with an optimistic smile.
author: Kevin Cramer

title: I like my smile.
author: Ileana D'Cruz

title: I'm a positive guy, even if I don't smile a lot.
author: James Arthur

author: Shinji Kagawa

title: After my husband John Lennon passed away, I tried to smile for my health.
author: Yoko Ono

title: Remember that it is not enough to abstain from lying by word of mouth; for the worst lies are often conveyed by a false look, smile, or act.
author: Abraham Cahan

title: You see, with me, when I'm nervous, I smile and laugh.
author: Paula Radcliffe

title: I don't smile or talk before 10 A.M. unless it's scripted.
author: Melanie Scrofano

title: I'm only 20; you've got your whole career ahead of you. I'm just focused on playing for West Ham and playing with a smile on my face and enjoying it.
author: Declan Rice

title: If I am not mistaken, it was a British poet who said that 'no one is properly dressed unless he wears a smile.'
author: Sukarno

title: Putting a smile on kids, putting a smile on families' faces, changing people's lives with your so-called status and celebrity with your so-called impact, that's reality.
author: DeMarcus Cousins

author: Alessia Cara

title: I want to be able to touch people's heart through my music. I want to bring a smile on every face. In my own humble, small way, I want to touch lives.
author: Adnan Sami

author: Stromae

author: Jonny Bairstow

author: Miriam Toews

title: If there's a photo of a roomful of kids I'm the one with the biggest smile or my hand over my face.
author: Peter Hedges

author: Marko Arnautovic

title: What I love about comedy is that it's unquestionably working. There are varying degrees of that, where there's something that makes you smile and is funny versus something that makes you hysterically laugh.
author: Abbi Jacobson

title: It's actually more work for me to not smile than to smile.
author: Victoria Arlen

title: It's nice when you can enjoy yourself and make people smile.
author: Peter Crouch

title: I know people want to get out there, and they're all tattooed up, and they're all serious and stuff and ready to fight. I'm ready to fight, but I still have a smile on my face at the same time.

author: Prateik Babbar

author: Farhan Akhtar

title: Southerners smile more than other Americans.
author: John Shelton Reed

title: 'Tropic Thunder' is one of my favorite movies of all time. 'Blazing Saddles.' Anything that will get me to smile.
author: John Cena

author: Mary Berry

title: I just want to show the fans my big smile and play the game that I love.
author: Yani Tseng

title: When I step out of my front door, I have to paint on a bright, big smile to make sure people treat me kindly rather than with suspicion, or assume that I'm going to be aggressive.
author: Wunmi Mosaku

title: I like to post positive content, and I like to try and make people smile. That's why those videos are popular. I don't fake it.
author: Cameron Dallas

title: The purpose of Disneyland is to make people smile.
author: Kevin Plank

title: I love Motown, that whole era. Marvin Gaye, Smokey Robinson. I just put on Pandora, and put it on Motown, and it makes me smile; makes me smile so much.
author: Tika Sumpter

author: Biju Menon

title: You have to continue to smile through life. And it's good when you get to bring that out in a character.
author: Jason Mitchell

author: Trent Alexander-Arnold

title: My natural reaction is to smile through things.
author: Hannah Brown

author: Tyron Woodley

title: What is important is the reliability of my posts being there to greet my fans with a smile or a giggle every morning. That's how we keep on growing.
author: George Takei

title: There are certain expectations that are put on you as a child actor, but mainly it's just turn up and say your lines with a lot of energy and a cute smile.
author: Naomie Harris

title: Mary Peters. When I was having my sulky, stroppy, bad loser phase I watched her at the Olympics. Sometimes she failed but always with a smile and good grace. She taught me how to win and lose, and I have a photo taken with her in my lounge.
author: Sue Barker

title: While you're improvising, you may come up with something which will break him up. As soon as that smile comes out, you know that, hey, we're having fun.

title: People don't know that when there is something running in my mind, I start smiling. If I'm angry, I smile and blush.
author: Hansika Motwani

title: In the room, when I'm playing SpongeBob, I'm optimistic and I'm happy, and I smile in the face of those who are upset in order to make them happier. author: Ethan Slater

title: You see some of these actors, they have a permanent smile on their face. How can they do that? It really fascinates me.
author: Agnes Bruckner

title: I hoped I could make people smile and laugh and have a good time.
author: Carson Kressley

title: My children and my husband make me smile. My work makes me smile.

author: Jennifer Saunders

author: Neil Cavuto

author: Keylor Navas

title: When I was two and a half or three, my mom got a call from someone asking if wanted to go on an audition. I ended up getting the job; it was a commercial for Hasbro. It was my first audition and first commercial. I just had to smile and laugh and dance around.
author: Megan Charpentier

title: Bob Dylan has always sealed his decisions with the unexplainable. His motives for withholding the release of the magnificent 'Basement Tapes' will be as forever obscure as Brian Wilson's reasons for the destruction of the tapes for 'Smile.'
author: Jon Landau

title: I will know how to hold you just by the look in your eye, I will never forget - not even on the day that I die. This is a promise of my passion for you, smile at me and make it true.
author: Diana Lynn

title: Work hard and do it right. Very simple; but very effective. They are morals I got from my mum and dad. And within that are the details. Be respectful. Try and smile, try and enjoy it. They are things that I still value.
author: Sean Dyche

title: If you're going to kill someone there isn't much reason to get all worked up about it and angry - you just pull the trigger. Angry discussions beforehand are a waste of time. We need to smile at Novell while we pull the trigger.
author: Jim Allchin

title: I'm just trying to find ways to give back and use my platform to put a smile on other people's faces and ultimately make change.
author: Kenny Stills

title: When people ask me, 'Why don't you drink?' I usually smile and say 'Because I'm not good at it.'
author: Chris Gethard

title: If you call making people smile with 'The Pink Panther,' then I made a contribution.
author: Henry Mancini

title: Goals flow when you play with a smile and don't think too much.
author: Alvaro Morata

title: Don't come to me and smile and then stab me behind my back.
author: Larry Johnson

title: There are some women whose pregnancy would make some sly bachelor smile.
author: Honore de Balzac

title: I'm one of those guys that - as far as relationships and stuff go - if you smile at me, I'm like, 'Let's date for three years' - which is just ridiculous.
author: Norman Reedus

title: Honestly, just all the love and respect from the fans, that's always the biggest thing that puts a smile on my face.
author: Demetrious Johnson

title: I'm a Christian guy. I believe that we're going to heaven, and I believe when Dale Jr. and I drove off from Turn 4 at Daytona, I think that Dale Sr. had a smile on his face.
author: Michael Waltrip

title: Women do come up to me, and they tell me what they think! I've gotten great compliments on my eyes and my smile. But I don't see myself as sexy.
author: Jesse L. Martin

title: It's sort of a feeling of power onstage. It's really the ability to make people smile, or just to turn them one way or another for that duration of time, and for it to have some effect later on. I don't really think it's power... it's the goodness.
author: Robert Plant

title: I don't like to lose, man. I think that's where it starts for me. If we're not winning games, then I don't smile too often.
author: Jimmy Butler

title: I've been successful in different areas, but nothing brings a smile to my face more than my oldest son, Zaire, and my second son, Zion, saying the kind word of 'Dad.'
author: Dwyane Wade

title: My mother is a southern lady with short dark hair and a wary, blue-eyed smile. She is also an experimental chemist and teaches a college course entitled The Chemistry of Cooking.
author: Andrew Sean Greer

title: Comedians like to see people smile. With acting, I love giving people a feeling, an emotion. I like to give people a feeling. When they come away from my scene, I want them to think.
author: Keke Palmer

title: Women are blessed with lots and lots of extra ways to win or lose validation. If you're a woman, you'll be judged on your beauty and your wit and how often you smile. You'll be judged on how much hair you have in some places and not in others.
author: Faith Salie

title: Young girls and boys from all around the world let me know their personal story, and I can feel their smile through their words. To be able to look at those comments and just get encouragement from them and know that I am living the life that I'm supposed to is what keeps me going every day.
author: Lizzie Velasquez

title: I've worn a chainmail suit to swim with sharks, glided over Cirencester with a James Bond-style paramotor strapped to my back, eaten hippo steaks and had a bat dive down my bra. And all the while, I had to face the camera and smile.
author: Konnie Huq

title: I don't mind a little Sturm und Drang. When I was doing 'Riding in Cars With Boys,' I wouldn't smile at anybody, because my character, Bev, was angry at the world. I'm the opposite. Inside my head I'd be like, God, I'll explain to you at the end of shooting that I'm not this person.
author: Drew Barrymore

title: '24' was so serious that it was nice to join 'NCIS' and even be able to smile once or twice.
author: Annie Wersching

title: It just makes me smile - every time I hear somebody say 'Rusev Day,' it just makes me smile.
author: Rusev

title: Even if I'm not having the best time in a social situation, I'll force a smile.
author: Dave McCary

title: When Fortune smiles, I smile to think how quickly she will frown.
author: Robert Southwell

title: Make people have a smile when they finish your e-mail.
author: Letitia Baldrige

title: No, I like to wear as least amount of makeup as I can during my everyday life because I'm just all about keeping my skin healthy and hydrated and I love to laugh and have a great time and smile - that's when I feel the most pretty so I just want to make sure that I stay happy.
author: Lily Collins

title: Growing up, I was a socially awkward kid who didn't know where he fit in, and I didn't have many friends, but I always had wrestling. I always had what was in between those ropes, and that always put a smile on my face no matter what.
author: Johnny Gargano

title: Nixon had lists upon lists upon lists. They were tragic lists saying, 'Smile more,' or, 'Be stronger - remember, it is your job to spiritually uplift the nation.' This understanding of his limitations is heartbreaking.
author: Peter Morgan

title: Each one of us can do a good deed, every day and everywhere. In hospitals in desperate need of volunteers, in homes for the elderly where our parents and grandparents are longing for a smile, a listening ear, in the street, in our workplaces and especially at home.
author: Shari Arison

title: I have always loved a hard-faced girl. I get that Alison Goldfrapp isn't easy, and I like her belligerence. She's deeply sexy and controlled, like a Strict Machine, and it seems to wind the b'jesus out of the women I know. On the outside, I watch and smile and will her on like a twisted silent maiden aunt in the dark corner.
author: Alison Moyet

title: No matter what I put out, somebody will be offended. I made a video on 10 reasons to smile, and it has dislikes. That should be an indication that there will be some who get offended no matter what you do. The best you can do as an entertainer or as someone who performs is to follow what you believe in.
author: Lilly Singh

title: I don't leave a room unless I leave a smile. I want to leave them laughing.
author: Jenifer Lewis

title: I need to learn to smile more.
author: Unai Emery

title: I think a smile can make your whole body. Models, they look fabulous, but they don't smile, and they look so mad.
author: Serena Williams

title: A stale article, if you dip it in a good, warm, sunny smile, will go off better than a fresh one that you've scowled upon.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

title: Football has to work really hard to put a smile on people's face and not to be so focused on the question of money. Everything is in danger of losing its soul if you're always going to sell out to the highest bidder.
author: Gordon Taylor

title: We never respect those who amuse us, however we may smile at their comic powers.
author: Marguerite Gardiner

title: If I can make a kid smile playing baseball, that's pretty awesome.
author: Clayton Kershaw

title: I think people take a liking to a voice or something that makes them smile and feel good about themselves.
author: Jess Glynne

title: There's no doubt a bit of chicken in a creamy mushroom sauce with a side order of garlic mash will put a smile on your face.
author: Claudia Winkleman

title: The people of Liberia know what it means to be deprived of clean water, but we also know what it means to see our children to begin to smile again with a restoration of hope and faith in the future.
author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

title: People smile at me as if they know me. I just smile back. They probably might know me.
author: Jim Broadbent

title: Oscar Wilde always makes me smile - with respect and admiration. His short stories prove that it is possible to be both sarcastic, even cynical, but deeply compassionate. Just seeing the cover of one of Wilde's books in a bookshop makes me smile.
author: Orhan Pamuk

title: Every now and then, someone will tell me that one of my books has made them laugh out loud. I never believe them because: a.) my books don't make me laugh out loud; and b.) sometimes I have said this to a writer, when really what I meant was, 'Your book made me smile appreciatively.'
author: Mary Roach

title: Some people say I smile too much.
author: Andrew Scheer

title: When I want to make someone laugh in real life (as opposed to when I'm on stage where I tell one-liners), I tend to do prop comedy. For example, if I'm at the supermarket with my husband, I might put 16 bags of marshmallows in our cart when he's not looking, or if I'm trying to make a kid smile, I'll put my glasses on crooked.
author: Wendy Liebman

title: But I am convinced that those Jews who stand aside today with a malicious smile and with their hands in their trousers' pockets will also want to dwell in our beautiful home.
author: Theodor Herzl

title: I'm honest and tell it like it is. I've been around the horn a few times and learned valuable lessons from screwing up a bit. So, if I can pass off advice or make someone smile on the way to work, I'm for it.
author: Stone Cold Steve Austin

title: You get the best out of the girls when they're enjoying themselves, when they've got a smile on their face - they're working hard on the training pitch, but they're allowed to relax off it as well.
author: Steph Houghton

title: I like guys with a nice smile. I know it's cliche, but it's so true! I like a guy with a nice smile and nice eyes.
author: Rebecca Black

title: Every round I have three little targets. Maybe it is just 'talk to myself properly' or 'stand up straight on the greens.' One day I might say, 'Don't talk to anyone.' On another I'll be a lot chattier. Or I might say, 'smile all the way round.' Little things. But little things turn into bigger things.
author: Tommy Fleetwood

title: I'm real cool, like to smile, and like to have fun.
author: Anthony Bennett

title: Ever since I was four years old, I loved making people smile, making them think, making them feel good, feel some kind of emotion.
author: Ann-Margret

title: We forget that this music, music made by my brothers and sisters, is still a baby. It's just beginning. When I think of the possibilities, it makes me smile.
author: Barry White

title: The body is a universal language. Because if you spoke French, and I speak English, but I move like this or do certain movements, I can still make you smile and laugh.
author: Tiffany Haddish

title: Creating content to make people smile and laugh, that's what makes me happy.
author: Logan Paul

title: Let him who expects one class of society to prosper in the highest degree, while the other is in distress, try whether one side; of the face can smile while the other is pinched.
author: Thomas Fuller

title: When people smile in your direction when you do something, you tend to continue to do it.
author: Gavin Creel

title: We are entertainers. We have to give our audience a good time. If my name serves that purpose, if that brings a smile on your face, then I think it is good and my job has been done.
author: Tiger Shroff

title: I retire with a smile on my face, in good health, and ready to spend autumns at my kids' games instead of my own. I'm excited to start the next chapter of my life.
author: Drew Bledsoe

title: You can crack a joke and make a person smile but it matters a lot when that's on screen. It can be a very nice joke but if you shoot it badly or the actor gets the timing wrong, it won't be funny.
author: Jitendra Kumar

title: I get very nervous whenever I think about it. I've never done a serious play, and I have such awe of the woman - she's really my only idol. It's going to be a big stretch - certain people come out on stage and your face muscles automatically tense and you get ready to smile.
author: Judy Holliday

title: I had always thought of myself as a sanguine person, quite light and airy. But for a long while, no one could have possibly made me laugh or smile. It was awful.
author: Elizabeth Fraser

title: Actors are supposed to be these runaways that get in a covered wagon filled with hats and tambourines and go from town to town making people smile.
author: John Cho

title: I used to be a people pleaser, always have a smile on my face.
author: Tripti Dimri

title: I like guys with a sense of humor who smile a lot and are kind.
author: Nikki Glaser

title: One of the most important responsibilities in the Christian life is to care about others, smile at them, and be a friend to the friendless.
author: James Dobson

title: You can always tell folks from nonfolks. Folks like to feel good, like to smile for the camera when there's a big photo opportunity for a really good cause.
author: Russell Baker

title: Steve had a broad, easy smile and the biggest hands I had ever seen. I could tell by his stature and stride that he was accustomed to hard work.
author: Terri Irwin

title: Some people thought I wasn't taking the sport seriously because I was always laughing and having fun, but I loved my skiing, I loved my jumping, and I thought, 'Well, why not have a smile on my face when I'm doing something that I really, really love doing,' and that's how I was.
author: Eddie the Eagle

title: The Parthenon without the marbles is like a smile with a tooth missing.
author: Neil Kinnock

title: I come from a place where everything about me, even my body language, is saying: I mean you no harm. I smile, I laugh. Basic stuff for most people.
author: Oscar Isaac

title: When trying to remember my share in the glow of the eternal present, in the smile of God, I return to my childhood, too, for that is where the most significant discoveries turn up.
author: Hermann Hesse

title: If you're authentic, people smile because they sense there's a piece of themselves there.
author: Bonnie Hunt

title: I never laugh or smile when I am writing. When I come home for lunch after writing all morning, my wife says I look like I just came home from a funeral. This is not bragging. This is an illness.
author: Carl Hiaasen

title: Sometimes you say things with a smile with the precise intention of making it clear that you are not being serious, and are only kidding. If I salute a friend with a smile and say, 'How are you, you old scoundrel!' clearly I don't really mean he's a scoundrel.
author: Umberto Eco

title: I have my father's lopsided mouth. When I smile, my lips slope to one side. My doctor sister calls it my cerebral palsy mouth. I am very much a daddy's girl, and even though I would rather my smile wasn't crooked, there is something moving for me about having a mouth exactly like my father's.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

title: I'm not invincible. I am not picture-perfect. The reason I am here is not because of the money; if I get to entertain people and put a smile on their face, I feel content.
author: Varun Dhawan

title: The coolest part about seeing a girl wear something comfortable is the smile that you can just feel coming through from inside her.
author: Kellan Lutz

title: If somebody asks for a photo, with a smile, it is nothing.
author: Nuno Espirito Santo

title: When you're on-stage, you're expected to perform in the bar business. You shake hands. You smile. You're all positive energy: you add to your environment. When you walk in the door to the back of the house, that's like a stage door. You're off-stage now.
author: Jon Taffer

title: A Little Hope' is a song we wrote a couple of years ago and hated the thought of it not getting at least a little attention. It's a song that just makes you smile.
author: Bart Millard

title: It's been a hard time to celebrate, to come out with a smile. But I'm an American. Naomi asked me to come out to support other Americans, and here I am.
author: Angie Everhart

title: I think one of my first jokes - in the black community, there's people who have jokes about skin tone. People like, 'You so black, you purple.' 'You so black, you gotta smile so we can see you at night.'
author: Hannibal Buress

title: I cry at anything remotely touching - smile at me warmly and I'm off... television also does it, everything from 'X-Factor' to cereal commercials. I cry when I am tired. I also cry when I laugh.
author: Natalie Massenet

title: Arnold Palmer has what I call an 'Eisenhower smile'. Those two men, they'd smile and their whole faces would look so pleasant; it was like they were smiling all over.
author: Byron Nelson

title: I love to smile. I love to laugh. I like to hear jokes. For instance, when I'm on the road, every night I watch 'Seinfeld.' I find it somewhere. I think it's so funny, and I watch the repeats over and over again.
author: Engelbert Humperdinck

title: It's true that a smile can take years off a person - not that such a thing matters in Yoko Ono's case.
author: Elvis Mitchell

title: My mum is great for keeping hold of old classics - pieces of clothing that never age and never go out of fashion. She also says, 'Make sure you always smile - it makes everything look better!'
author: Amber Le Bon

title: Obama's stern demeanor punctuated by intermittent flashes of his wide, relaxing smile is his greatest weapon in defusing pent-up angst.
author: Tina Brown

title: The spotlight, attention, all that doesn't really matter. You go home to your daughter, even after a loss when you're upset and you don't want to talk to anybody. You see her crack that smile, and it changes your day.
author: Saquon Barkley

title: Sometimes people have questioned whether I was making fun of the industry or just at myself. I'm just trying to raise a smile. Clothes aren't meant to be worshipped at a church altar.
author: Jeremy Scott

title: I really get a smile that people think they have a right to even suggest how I give my money away. I have no mandate to give a dime to anybody.
author: Peter B. Lewis

title: Y'know, smile, dance, get crazy... we sure do while we're making it, because music is our leeezshure; it's my fun.
author: Bernard Edwards

title: I always challenge myself. I get out in deep water and I always try to get back. But I get hung up. The audience never knows, but that's when I smile the most, when I show the most ivory.
author: Earl Hines

title: I loved the Kennedy Center Honors because you just sit there, smile, wave, and cry.
author: Carol Burnett

title: The Oscars are a lot different when you are a nominee. You walk around with this big smile on your face, and everyone, even people who work for rival film companies, tells you they voted for you.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

title: I can remember being a kid and watching Vanilla Ice and it made me smile... I love it. I love that. I can remember seeing Vanilla Ice and then through time he stopped being Vanilla Ice.
author: Riff Raff

title: If my life and music brings a smile or makes a difference in any individual's life, then there is nothing beyond for me as a god's gift.
author: Adnan Sami

title: City Ballet has to develop choreographers of stature and a new approach to coaching before everything we value about it fades away and, in the great tradition of the Cheshire Cat, there's nothing left but Peter Martins' smile.
author: Robert Gottlieb

title: I receive kindness every day. I love to smile when I'm out and about, and if someone smiles back, which happens about half the time, I think that's an act of kindness every couple of minutes in my day.
author: Eddie the Eagle

title: I like being able to look in the mirror and seeing a smile on my face.
author: Clint Dempsey

title: If you don't like your job, then change it by getting some better skills. Until then, shut up and get my burger with a smile, like in the commercials.
author: Carlos Mencia

title: When you're watching somebody read your material and they smile and nod, you know you've found that place where your experience and their experience match, even though they aren't the same exact experience.
author: Chris Crutcher

title: I always like to spend time with the kids, especially with kids who need help. For them and for the parents, to see their smile is always nice.
author: Alexander Ovechkin

title: Girls are almost always socialized to be perfect: 'Smile, do well in school, don't take too many risks.'
author: Kimberly Bryant

title: There's a different expectation, not just on mothers but on women. We're expected to do it all, to have it all, and look good through the process and have a smile on our face, and that's not always the case.
author: Catherine Reitman

title: I guess the news is this: If you're a Republican and you smile, liberals don't like it. Maybe that's because Democrats are afraid that I've been able to show an optimistic vision for this country.
author: Cory Gardner

author: Summer Sanders

author: Rana el Kaliouby

title: When I was a kid, we'd go to the movies, and my parents would reach out to everyone around us in the theater, most of whom could barely afford the movie ticket. author: Daniel Lubetzky

title: While journalists cannot right every wrong, champion every cause or fix every problem, they can - through the written word - lift someone's burden for a day, make some elderly woman on a bus smile or let them know they are noticed by someone.
author: Regina Brett

title: I enjoy what Twitter is because I can really connect with the fans and it's a great way to share information with them and it's also a great way to entertain. I like being able to put a smile on people's faces and letting them know what I'm doing.
author: Peter Facinelli

author: Corey Feldman

title: Because football is an emotional game, it's full of feeling, and that's why we try to train with a smile on our face. At the same time, we work very hard, but it's a fine line, and you've got to try and get that balance right if you can.
author: Chris Coleman

title: In Delhi, where I grew up, commerce is brusque. You don't ask each other how your day has been. You might not even smile. I'm not saying this is ideal - it's how it is. You're tied together by a transaction. The customer doesn't tremble before complaining about how cold his food is.
author: Karan Mahajan

title: I think who you are in school really sticks with you. I don't ever feel like the cool kid at the party, ever. It's like, 'Smile and be nice to everybody, because you were not invited to be here.'

title: A body smiles, like, 72 times a day. Where does that smile go? That's what I want to know.

title: We think of stars as celestial beings. And once in a while, they smile at us from the pages of 'People' magazine.

title: You have to promote yourself; you have to have this smile on your face all the time and be this nice guy - which I am!
author: Craig Roberts

author: Regis Philbin

title: I don't usually talk about the social work I do because I don't do it for publicity. If I can bring a smile to the face of a few children in this one lifetime, I'd be happy.
author: Vivek Oberoi

author: Bill Bailey

title: I'd rather be entertained and go to a show and watch a drummer and have somebody that makes me actually smile. So I don't judge drummers based on their technical ability; I judge them based on the overall package and what they bring to the music they're part of.
author: Mike Portnoy

author: Tamron Hall

title: At one time, you could sit on the Rue de la Paix in Paris or at the Habima Theater in Tel Aviv or in Medina and you could see a person come in, black, white, it didn't matter. You said, 'That's an American' because there's a readiness to smile and to talk to people.
author: Maya Angelou

title: I think there's a difference between making a feel-good movie like 'Think Like a Man' and a feel-good show like 'Common Law.' It's not too heavy, it's not too serious. You just walk away with a smile on your face. I think that makes people somewhat more endearing to you.
author: Michael Ealy

title: You know when someone's over-flattering you in a way. You smile but you can't believe it.
author: Laura Linney

author: Nadia Comaneci

author: Jodi Benson

title: We smile at the ignorance of the savage who cuts down the tree in order to reach its fruit; but the same blunder is made by every person who is over eager and impatient in the pursuit of pleasure.
author: William Ellery Channing

title: What looks like enjoyment is the sneer of contempt. That's not a smile.
author: Jack Kevorkian

title: I was born with an extremely negative attitude. I was the kid who wouldn't smile in Christmas photos, was a poor sport, and hated a lot of things. I eventually grew out of my negativity when I matured.
author: Colton Haynes

title: I have two rules for a great book: make me think and make me smile.
author: Adam Grant

title: A game one of my sisters will play with me in my first year of being alive is called Good Baby, Bad Baby. author: Ali Smith

title: As long as I am still interested and curious, I enjoy getting up in the morning, but I can't say I have a happy smile on my face 24/7.
author: Harriet Walter

title: It is spectacular. From about five minutes in, when we knew for sure that we were going to have the weather to go, the smile on my face just got bigger and bigger, and I was just beaming through the whole launch. I mean, it is just an amazing ride.
author: Chris Hadfield

title: I've been doing this since I was a kid. I'm always going to play the game with a smile on my face, blowing bubbles, sunflower seeds, whatever it is. That's just who I am.
author: Manny Machado

title: I enjoy making people laugh and making them smile.
author: La La Anthony

title: I bring people on stage with me. It's a good time, and people love to join in on the party. Show me a smile, and I'll show you one back.
author: Vanilla Ice

title: When I pick my greens, right, I smile. I smile when I pick the greens, and when I wash the greens, I smile. Then when I cut them up, I smile. And then when I cook them, I smile. They call it joyful greens.
author: Tiffany Haddish

title: He taught me never to smile, which helps me when I visit disaster sites.
author: Emo Philips

title: I can't help but smile when I ride Valegro; I think something, and he does it. I laugh, and I think, 'God, how does he know? I didn't even ask. I just thought it.'
author: Charlotte Dujardin

title: I'm about great competition. That's why I can have a great smile beforehand and connect with the crowd, and then, when I get in the ring, I flip that switch.
author: Matt Riddle

title: I work with my brother Finneas, and he produces all of my music in his little bedroom in our house. We actually tried renting out a studio for a month when we were producing 'Don't Smile at Me,' but it was really hard there, and we ended up just doing it at home anyway.
author: Billie Eilish

title: It took a long time for me to put a smile on my face over the course of my lifetime, and my experience of what I've been through on and off the field.
author: Deshaun Watson

title: We need prisons because there are some hardcore criminals, but I never met a guy who has been in jail that came out with a smile on his face thinking, 'Right, that's it - now I am going to be good!'
author: Tahar Rahim

title: Every bit of joy in my heart, you know, every smile on my face is yours. It's awesome to be able to share that with somebody.
author: Brantley Gilbert

author: Jessica St. Clair

title: I have a few go-to moves like jazz hands, shake the booty, stupid eyes. It was once a mating ritual, but now it's all about looking silly and making the kids smile.
author: John Cho

title: Ala Modalaindi' is a labour of love and leaves me with a smile when I look back.
author: Ashish Vidyarthi

title: For me, anytime I see a mother truly loving her child, famous or not, it brings a smile to my face. I think most people would agree.
author: Coco Rocha

title: The last time I saw Ted Kennedy was a generation after my first meeting, at the Senate subway below the Capitol on Obama's Inauguration Day. He was his usual gregarious and gracious self - with beaming smile and booming voice wishing my husband and me good luck with our pregnancy and expressing his excitement about the new president.
author: Christine Pelosi

title: I'm the middle man. I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
author: Donald Dunn

title: But with exquisite breathing you smile, with satisfaction of love, And I touch you again as you tick in the silence and settle in sleep.
author: Karl Shapiro

title: I'm an open book. I speak to people all the time and generally have a smile on my face. I'm true to who I am, so you can never always smile and be happy.
author: Daniel Sturridge

title: You cannot expect a driver who has just lost a shot at pole position to run around with a smile on his face. You need to accept that he is upset in a different way to how we are upset.
author: Toto Wolff

title: No connection to the average voter - Clinton has an air of superiority. Despite her wide smile and pleasant appearance, she is envisioned as someone who is trying to hide something all the time.
author: Fabrizio Moreira

title: When I play all the time, I play with a smile on my face, and then I can help my team with my goals and my game and the way I can play football.
author: Dimitar Berbatov

title: I love a girl that can make me laugh. I am not really a laugh-at-things type of guy and I don't smile and laugh all the time... But if a girl can make me laugh... I'm in love!!!!
author: Jesse McCartney

title: The 'good' mother, with her fixed smile, her rigidity, her goody-goody outlook, her obsession with unnecessary hygiene, is in fact a fool. It is the 'bad' mother, unafraid of a joke and a glass of wine, richly self-expressive, scornful of suburban values, who is, in reality, good.
author: Rachel Cusk

title: We're here for the fans. At the end of the day, that's what WWE is all about. If we can put a smile on their faces, we've done our job.
author: Mandy Rose
tags: Done, Day, End Of The Day

title: Whenever I go on the red carpet and I'm a bit nervous, I just say to myself the mantra, 'Come on Barbara, you gotta get those pictures posted on Instagram!' That's all I have in my mind, like, 'Look serious now, maybe give a little smile, but a cheeky one,' but in the end, it's never how it looks.
author: Barbara Palvin

title: A healthy smile has always been important to me.
author: Yvonne Orji

title: The great thing about Daniel Ricciardo is you can't not like him, he's got a big smile, he loves what he does, he's a great personality.
author: Christian Horner

title: Somebody said to me, 'Whenever somebody says your name, a smile comes to their face.' That's a great accolade. I strive to keep it that way.
author: Clarence Clemons

title: I'm so glad cities have personalities, just like people have personalities. That's something that makes me smile.
author: Fred Armisen

title: I don't have to jump up and smile just because TV wants me to.
author: Walter Payton

title: People enjoy the game of basketball, so if you're not smiling, the fans are not going to smile. You can't go around mean-mugging everybody at every game.
author: Shawn Kemp

title: At the end of the day, it's a game. You play the best that you can. You need to keep a smile. You need to be nice to others. Everybody's trying hard.
author: Dinesh Karthik
