title: They took my 30s, my 40s, my 50s, but what they couldn't take was my joy. I couldn't do nothing about the years, but I could control my joy... I kept a smile on my face; I kept love in my heart.
author: Anthony Ray Hinton

title: My grandmother, whom we call Biel, thinks it's very unbecoming of me not to smile for the paparazzi. So every time I see them, I think, 'Smile for Biel!'
author: Jessica Biel

title: I just have to stay focused and play football with a smile on my face.
author: Declan Rice

title: In the past, I tried to put on a brave face and smile after a defeat, but then it would backfire in training, and I'd get frustrated. Now I just embrace it, let it out, and then, two days later, I'm back in training and ready for the next game.
author: Millie Bright

title: I try to live my life with happiness and with a smile on my face. I try to do my best.
author: Joao Moutinho

title: The Viennese wash everything. Where else in the world does the government hire public servants to wash public telephone booths and the glass over traffic lights? Every time I see someone doing these things, I smile like a child.
author: Jonathan Carroll

title: It's really hard to smile when you play. As a performer, if I ever find myself focusing, it's like, 'Oh no - orchestra face!' It's not attractive at all, so I have to focus on smiling.
author: Lindsey Stirling

title: A female celebrity just has to chat and smile with a guy for him to become the new man in her life. Amazing.
author: Raveena Tandon

title: I kept hiding my smile in pictures throughout middle school and most of high school until picture day came my senior year.
author: Uzo Aduba

title: I always come on the ground with a smile on the face, but inside, I'm always ready to fight and try to give as much as I can.
author: Imran Tahir

title: I like to smile a lot before going in the car. I make jokes, even on the grid, and then I can still manage to focus when it counts.
author: Romain Grosjean

title: I just try to enjoy the game, play with a smile on my face, and be the best I can be.
author: Manny Machado

title: A smile is better when you win.
author: Unai Emery

title: If women had to promise to provide for a man for a lifetime before he removed his veil and showed her his smile, would we think of this as a system of female privilege?
author: Warren Farrell

title: I have learned to smile when I wasn't happy, to sing when I didn't feel like it, and to do things just to please my fans.
author: Tionne Watkins

title: I don't have kids, but in the future, if I ever do, I would want my child to be happy no matter what: gay, lesbian, bi - whatever. To see a smile on my child's face would be the only thing that would matter and keep my blood pumping.
author: Cupcakke

title: I am trying to inspire people to just take control of their oral health, because if we don't take care of our oral health, it affects so many different aspects of our lives. If your smile and mouth is not together, it affects your relationship, your self-esteem, your health.
author: Sherri Shepherd

title: Even as a Miss World, you have to roleplay sometimes. When you look at some people, you feel like breaking down but you've to smile and spread happiness. So of course, I know I am a good actor.
author: Manushi Chhillar

title: I really love taking a girl who has no idea how to wear makeup and teach her everything, and show her the difference at the end. The smile on their face is just amazing. It's like they won a million dollars.
author: Maryse Mizanin

title: When I was little, I didn't smile much. Don't get me wrong. I was a happy kid, but I couldn't stand the space, dead center, in between my teeth. Yeah, I could whistle through it, but so what? That didn't win me many points on the playground in Medfield, Massachusetts.
author: Uzo Aduba

title: It's easy to get bogged down in all the negativity that when you see people smile and pat you on the back and say, 'We're going to get through this,' it means a lot.
author: Michael Waltrip

title: In politics you learn to always smile.
author: Eliot Spitzer

title: I think I've always had a certain amount of skepticism of this whole 'shut up and smile' theory. I haven't ever swallowed that pill so easily, although I tried.
author: Amber Heard

title: When you're surrounded by feathers and sequins and ridiculous Lycra outfits, it's impossible not to have a smile on your face.
author: Catherine Martin

title: The fact that on the day I came back to City we stayed in the UEFA Cup through a last-minute own goal against Midtjylland and then won a dramatic penalty shoot-out made me smile.
author: Shaun Wright-Phillips

title: I absolutely love my fans, and I get to chat to them a lot on Twitter, and that's why I think Twitter is really great. They call themselves 'The Sprouts' and they are really, really wonderful, so passionate, and they make me smile.
author: Samantha Barks

title: I've learned to lose with a smile on my face. That's what the Oscar teaches you.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

title: I get really frustrated if people don't smile.
author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

title: I'm not the athlete I was when I was training for the Olympics in '92 or when I was working out every single day. I have to live in moderation: I work out three or four days a week, and I smile while I'm working out - I really do enjoy it. I work out with my girlfriends and make it a social competition.
author: Summer Sanders

title: When I hear theists and atheists pontificating on how they know God does or does not exist, I can only smile at the irrationality and, yes, vanity of the notion.
author: Vincent Bugliosi

title: Allowing yourself to smile takes 99% of the effort.
author: Simon Travaglia

title: We have such a long, familiar history with Peter Falk. The minute his mug is on that screen people smile.
author: Paul Reiser

title: Starting from scratch and seeing the smile on a client's face when it all comes together in the end - it's a lovely feeling.
author: Gauri Khan

title: I am very bad at taking compliments. Even in school, when people told me that I look good, I could just manage an awkward thank you and a smile.
author: Barun Sobti

title: A couple things I'm gonna be remembered for: the hat backwards and the swing. And the smile.
author: Ken Griffey Jr.

title: I'm happy to help Crest Whitestrips on their mission to inspire photographers everywhere to capture smile moments and would encourage aspiring photographers to express themselves through their photos.
author: Nigel Barker

title: I collect all the reviews of the films I turned down. And when they're bad - I have to smile.
author: Simone Signoret

title: This is the trouble with cheating: there are no acceptable rules, or laws. It could be a smile, or dancing to a song that you considered to be indefinably 'ours'. It can feel like cheating to go to a restaurant that you used to go to with someone else. Keeping photographs of exes can infuriate, like retrospective cheating.
author: A. A. Gill

title: Julia Roberts taught me how to knit on the set of 'Mona Lisa Smile.'
author: Julia Stiles

title: As the Supreme Governor of the Church of England, the Queen feels she cannot be seen to smile in church - and her natural reaction is to combat mirth by putting on a stern face.
author: Ingrid Seward

title: When the best manager in the world says you're one of his favourite players, you act like it's nothing, but you still can't help but have a smile on your lips.
author: Leonardo Bonucci

title: I don't know what other fighters do, but when I get hit and go down, I smile and I say, 'I'm going to hit you harder than you hit me, and I'm going to knock you out.' The times I go down and get back up - that's when I'm the most dangerous.
author: Naseem Hamed

title: I didn't lose my smile from the first to the last match at Arsenal. I remember when I left I wanted to thank everyone, even the dressing-room staff.
author: Gervinho

title: When I draw my caricature self-portrait, I always do a huge smile.
author: Rolf Harris

title: Some people are fighting much, much more important battles and much bigger battles, and if we get the chance to put a smile on their face for ten seconds, it's so worth it.
author: Dolph Ziggler

title: I make films for people to smile, laugh, and have fun.
author: Prabhu Deva

title: The Irish want to smile, and they want to have fun.
author: Shaggy

title: I'm a huge sun baby. As soon as the sun comes out, my smile gets bigger, so I'm constantly smiling in L.A. It's a fantastic place to be.
author: Ricky Whittle

title: What I always think about when I think about 'Girls' is Lena being in a scene where she's very vulnerable, possibly directing, acting, and she's probably written the dialogue. It's 2 in the morning. Everyone's tired. Everyone's grumpy. And she has a smile on her face and kindness for everyone who interacts with her.
author: Jennifer Konner

title: I always say to myself that if I can make a movie that makes a kid smile or gives them some hope or something to get excited about, then I'm applying myself in the best way that I can. I don't think that just goes for kids. I think that it goes for adults, as well, and for families.
author: Nicolas Cage

title: Usually, if you smile at them and show some interest in the toy, they will give it to you. That's a straight up Democrat move!
author: Margaret Cho

title: I'm all about people that appreciate, that are grateful, that smile, that have a sense of humour - the dirtier the laugh, the better- that's my kind of vibe... and I hope that's the kind of thing that I attract.
author: Poppy Delevingne

title: Seeing Michelle Obama's bright color choices, and how she made people smile and reinforced Obama's platforms of hope and change, was inspiring.
author: Lilly Pulitzer

title: I like to smile a lot and I always try to be happy, joking around and stuff.
author: Willian

title: I want people to come to Clipper games and smile. I want people to come to Clipper games and be entertained and dance and laugh.
author: Baron Davis

title: For a man so incredibly hairy and square, watching my dad get on a bike was like watching a penguin spread its wings and take flight. He'd take off at inhuman speed, a smile on his face, and never look back.
author: Zelda Williams

title: I want people to smile when they hear my name.
author: Lil B

title: A man can be drawn across the room with the simplicity of a smile. That's why your pearly whites should always be straight and shiny. I think most of my clients are drawn to a fun, flirty nature in a woman. The problem is, most women do not often feel fun and flirty.
author: Patti Stanger

title: My sculptures cause an uproar, astonishment, and put a smile on your face.
author: Florentijn Hofman

title: When I was younger, I'd go to the Museum of Television and Radio in New York and watch this beautiful clip of Billie Holiday playing with a bassist, a pianist and Gerry Mulligan, who was a friend of mine, on baritone sax. At one point, she looks over at Gerry, and they just smile. When those moments happen, it's just lovely.
author: Patti Scialfa

title: I hope there have been times when I made you all proud, or made you all smile or at least piqued your interest in this wonderful institution we call government.
author: John Rowland

title: Have you seen these Japanese hospital droids, or humanoids, or whatever they call it? They've perfected the skin, and the skin looks so real. They have these motors between the eyes for when they smile. It's just mind-blowing.
author: Joel Kinnaman

title: One of the most obvious parts of my character is the smile, and if I wasn't comfortable in myself then I wouldn't be able to smile so much.
author: Max Walker

title: I feel like looking in the mirror when you brush your teeth, yes, I see lines, and then I smile and I see things here and there. But that's just, you know, you - that's your journey, you know?
author: Heidi Klum

title: People ask me a lot, 'How can you smile all the time?' I tell them, 'I was never angry. God created me this way. He created me laughing and smiling.'
author: Phan Thi Kim Phuc

title: As a female, you are often being asked by directors to be warmer, softer, flirt more, smile more etc... None of those things are bad, and obviously we are capable of a variety of human behavior, but it gets really old having to play into somebody's stereotype or ideal.
author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

title: How players react to questions that you ask can give definitive information as to the strength of their hand. Even an opponent who says nothing at all might be sending a silent signal. A mere shrug, an awkward smile, or even a frozen stare can be meaningful.
author: Daniel Negreanu

title: People often expect me to be very serious, but it's not like my record company told me not to smile in photographs, because I was like that anyway.
author: Jose Gonzalez

title: If what I have to do is share a sandwich to lift someone's spirits, put a smile on their face - the worst thing that happens is I go broke!
author: Jose Andres

title: Practicing yoga has helped me realize a deeper, grounded way of being in the world. I have learned how to communicate in a meaningful way that makes me smile and have learned the super handy skill of efficiency. Use what you need. Rest what you don't.
author: Tara Stiles

title: Growing up, I was a huge fan of horror movies. There's nothing more fun than going into a movie with a smile because you know you're going to be scared to death. There's something thrilling about sitting there waiting for a scare to happen.
author: Ashley Bell

title: I smile because I am a happy guy.
author: Fernandinho

title: If in the first 30 seconds, a comedian cannot bring a smile to your face, he is not an entertainer.
author: Chunky Pandey

title: We are all negative people, born negative people, so we concentrate on the good things in life, and that's what makes us smile.
author: Sonny Sandoval

title: I remember my mom sitting at our kitchen table, paying bills with a small smile. She'd sigh and say, 'I'm so blessed to be able to pay these.' She knew it was about what you have.
author: Faith Salie

title: It's amazing because people come up to me and say, 'Chuck, you're the luckiest guy in the world to be a world karate champion and a movie and TV star.' When they say this to me, I kind of smile because luck had nothing to do with it; God had everything to do with it.
author: Chuck Norris

title: After six years without seeing one, I love just seeing a smile - every smile I see gives me hope.
author: Ingrid Betancourt

title: I don't ever feel like the cool kid at the party, ever. It's like, 'Smile and be nice to everybody, because you were not invited to be here.'
author: Taylor Swift

title: My father was short for a man, with a child's plaything for a name - Spinner. He had flawless dark brown skin and a head full of big, wet-looking curls, black as oil. And he had the smile of a scoundrel - the kind of smile that disarmed men and undressed women.
author: Charles M. Blow

title: There's an old adage about speakers: You won't remember what they said, but you'll never forget how they made you feel. Trump knows that in his bones. He gives his supporters - and they are growing - a terrific feeling of safety and security, along with a laugh and a smile.
author: Cass Sunstein

title: When you see someone at 6 in the morning with a smile on their face, you know they're having fun.
author: Justin Hartley

title: Everyone else has days when they don't want to smile, when you just want to come in and be regular.
author: Greg Oden

title: I have to smile because we, as footballers, are really lucky to do the job we do. But this is not just a job for me. It's my passion.
author: Samir Nasri

title: If you cannot smile when you listen to music, then do not listen to it!
author: Estelle

title: As for me, it is interesting to play a role that is not human; it is nice to be all powerful without fancy action scenes. But, it is not funny to play God, even on film. You don't speak much and just smile beatifically.
author: Sudeep

title: What do I like in a girl? I like a girl that likes me, a girl that knows how to smile and see the bright side of things. A girl that makes me a better person.
author: James Lafferty

title: When I was doing 'Smile,' I was looking back at pictures of myself and going, 'Thank goodness I couldn't do the sprayed-bangs thing! Everybody's so embarrassed by that hairstyle now, but I was never cool enough to pull it off!'
author: Raina Telgemeier

title: Football still gives me butterflies; it still makes me smile.
author: Nikita Parris

title: Anybody who knows me knows that I'm just here to put a smile on people's faces.
author: Jason Mitchell

title: I love a good laugh as well, I think that's so important in life, which is probably why I've dabbled in comedy writing as well as horror. I think if you can make someone laugh or smile it's the most special thing in the world.
author: Paul Kane

title: When it's your will versus another person's will, the worst thing you can do is smile in their face when you're competing. That's what I tell our guys. Go have fun.
author: DeAngelo Williams

title: I like people with their own opinions, and I like people who argue with me. It's very exhausting to be in a room full of people who just nod and smile.
author: Shonda Rhimes

title: I am a woman, a mother, a daughter, a friend, a human being as any other human. I just happen to write songs and perform them, and I am lucky to be able to make a living with my music. Other than that, I smile, laugh, and cry, like any other woman.
author: Lara Fabian

title: I don't always like walking down the street and making sure that I smile and say hello to everybody who's walking their dog in the opposite direction. But I do do it. And it's a small, tiny thing to do. But to me, it means 'I see you. You're not invisible to me.'
author: Patty Griffin

title: I could be hit by a Sara Lee truck tomorrow. Which is not a bad way of going: 'Richard Simmons Found in a Freeway in Pound Cake and Fudge, With a Smile on His Face.' Let's face it. We don't know anything.
author: Richard Simmons

title: I know of a few actors who have Psoriasis but stay mum about it. I don't respond to those who do. I just smile and move on.
author: Rashami Desai

title: When I see these young girls who are dreaming the dream that I'm living, it's very very exciting and it puts a big smile on my face.
author: Sue Wicks

title: I've covered a lot of ground geographically and emotionally and for years I lost my connection with my family. But the best comfort you can have, whether you are on the phone or sitting there in the living room with them, is with your parents, and to me family has always meant protection. When you smile you get a smile back, unconditionally.
author: Brigitte Nielsen

title: I would advise any 17-year-old to surround yourself with people who listen to you, nod when you speak, and smile when you enter spaces.
author: Janet Mock

title: I like to smile. I try to bring happiness on and off the pitch. I don't understand how you can play football without joy.
author: Santi Cazorla

title: My new dressing goal is to make little kids and babies smile at all the bright, clashing colours I can wear at once. It makes me laugh when I catch sight of my own reflection - life is too short not have fun!
author: Liz Goldwyn
tags: Life, Reflection, Life Is Too Short

title: I play guys who never smile, and I never stop smiling.
author: Michael Kelly

title: Americans think Soviets are so grim. I want them to see that they can smile.
author: Yakov Smirnoff

title: For me, music makes my smile brighter during my workouts. It adds that extra something that motivates me to go further or work harder!
author: Summer Sanders

title: I'm as happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
author: Samuel Smiles

title: Generally, when a record label suggests album ideas for you, you smile politely, and then proceed to shoot it down, because it's never what you as an artist feel is right for you.
author: John Scofield

title: When most people think of Woodrow Wilson, they see a dour minister's son who never cracked a smile, where in fact he was a man of genuine joy and great sadness.
author: A. Scott Berg

title: I'm kind of living a Bruce Wayne life and then morphing into Batman, but I'm glad now Batman comes out during the day. That's kind of like how drag was: we were called upon at night to make people smile and laugh and clap.
author: Alyssa Edwards

title: I don't smile all the time, but I smile inside.
author: Dimitar Berbatov

title: I'm very fortunate that I get to make people smile by creating.
author: Mike Schultz

title: I've been to hundreds of conventions in my career. Sometimes I'm afraid I may get jaded by them. But then, I see a figure in bright colors walking up to me, and I smile. I thank them for reminding me of just how lucky I am to do what I get the honor to do every day of my life.
author: George Perez

title: As a model, I really stand for not being a model, if that makes sense. When I started, the whole idea of the model was very different; it was a bit stuck-up. Not stuck-up, but no one was trying to have fun, or not even have fun, but be willing to smile.
author: Cara Delevingne

title: 'Priced to sell' - just the phrase makes me smile. When a dealer says all the items in his booth are priced to sell, he means he's tagged them as aggressively as he can to get you to buy them. Don't worry, though, I still haggle. You have to. That's the point of a flea market.
author: Nate Berkus

title: I want to put concepts in front of people that make them laugh or smile or even hate what I do. I'm not interested in just putting clothes in stores.
author: Thom Browne

title: Making people smile makes me feel good from the inside.
author: Varun Sharma

title: It is boorish to live ungraciously: the giving is the hardest part; what does it cost to add a smile?
author: Jean de la Bruyere

title: I can be very stoic looking, that's just my facial expression. I don't smile a lot.
author: Robert Parish

title: Once every lunar eclipse, you should be able to see me smile!
author: Sophie Turner

title: There is no point to samba if it doesn't make you smile.
author: Alma Guillermoprieto

title: And History will smile to think that this is the species for which Socrates and Jesus Christ died.
author: Julien Benda

title: I always think there's some value in saying no with a smile.
author: Grant Shapps

title: Country music in the mid-'90s was a big influence on my career, and I played all the songs that are referenced in '94' back in my club days. Joe Diffie was rocking a sick mullet, and he was hotter than ever... just putting out monster hit after monster hit. It totally takes me back to those days, and it makes me smile every time I hear it.
author: Jason Aldean

title: It's not all about having the perfect body, perfect hair, perfect smile.
author: Emily Atack

title: Bjorn was a different breed, I threw my best material at him, but he would never smile, but that added to the charm when he played me and Mac. We were going nuts and losing our mind and he was sitting back like he was on a Sunday stroll.
author: Jimmy Connors

title: I smile so much at the theater my face hurts when I leave.
author: Heather Matarazzo

title: From a very young age, music was very much in my house. I would sit with my mom, with the old LPs, listening to The Beatles and Carly Simon and Lionel Richie. The old LPs used to have the lyrics. From there, I would put on dance and music displays for my family, just to entertain them and make people laugh and smile.
author: Lara Pulver

title: I don't want my writing to be work to read. My main goal is completely shameless entertainment. I want people to smile and giggle and enjoy the book. I'm not trying to save the world through literature.
author: Gail Carriger

title: After you have won a game, you can maybe smile for a minute and then you have to think: 'How can I recover as quickly as possible.'
author: Per Mertesacker

title: Everyone is so occupied that they hardly get time to laugh their fullest. So, I feel blessed that through the medium of cinema, I can bring a smile on someone's face.
author: Varun Sharma

title: My clothes and my interiors are about making people smile.
author: Matthew Williamson

title: I figured out, I guess, that the job just makes me happy if it's not number one. So if it all works, great. If it doesn't, I still go home, look at my kids, and I have a big smile on my face.
author: Thomas Kretschmann

title: I don't smile all the time. Trust me, there have been days when I have been a mess.
author: Janhvi Kapoor

title: I used to watch some of the reality shows about models, and then, weirdly, now I try to incorporate into my fashion shoots the skills I learnt from watching those shows. It's like, thanks Tyra, 'cause you've given me, like, all the cool tips. Like how to smile with your eyes.
author: Rebel Wilson

title: My worst day, I'm just going to try and smile.
author: Iman Shumpert

title: I wouldn't say money can buy happiness. Happiness starts with yourself. Money can buy a smile, though.
author: Mike Will Made It

title: Working with Operation Smile is a completely life-altering experience. It is truly inspiring to be a part of something with so many unique individuals who come together for the greater good of helping others.
author: Lydia Hearst

title: I'm not looking for anything more than any other guy. I like a good smile. Pretty eyes. She has to be active, like not play-sports active, but she'll play air hockey, do some pool, go for rides on the Santa Monica Pier. I would much rather have fun with her than do the cool thing.
author: Mitchel Musso

title: I wanted Jesus in 'A.D.' to be very, very, very human - to have those qualities of vulnerability and doubt and pain and sadness and loneliness. Once the resurrection happens and we see that Jesus has risen, it's almost complete, right? It's all about the joy and the smile and the happiness and the closeness to the disciples.
author: Juan Pablo Di Pace

title: My mom's one of the toughest ladies I know. I've seen her lose both her brothers, both her parents. She's been through a lot, and to see her get up every day and put a smile on her face, that shows nothing but strength.
author: DeMar DeRozan

title: I tend to look out for things with a resonance to my youth - artists or objects that seemed romantic all those years ago. I never buy anything purely for its value. I like possessions that smile back at me.
author: Nicholas Haslam

title: And I like the look on people's faces when I say I'm doing this movie called Pride and Prejudice and they kind of smile, and then I say I'm in a movie called Doom and they kind of do a double take and try and put the two things together. And they never quite manage to.
author: Rosamund Pike

title: I had the opportunity to go into the hospitals and talk to kids and see a kid and make him smile. Why? Because I'm a special person? No. It had nothing to do with that. It has everything to do with me being the quarterback at the University of Florida. And to not take advantage of that is a shame.
author: Tim Tebow

title: I love kids - they're so carefree and always put a smile on my face.
author: Jordan Burroughs

title: One can see the professionals and intellectuals talking to their rural brethren with an amused and condescending smile. They forget that but for the toiling rural masses, all their professional training and erudition would collapse like a castle of cards.
author: Sanjay Gandhi

title: Whenever I run into prejudice. I smile and feel sorry for them, and I say to myself, There's one more argument for birth control.
author: Freddy Fender

title: I always remember this neighbor who would ask me to babysit for her. She looked like Jayne Mansfield, and I remember babysitting for, like, five hours and she would pay me 80 cents, with a phony smile. I used to go home fuming to my mum.
author: Jennifer Coolidge

title: When onstage, I always try to take my audience through as many emotions as I possibly can. I want them to go from laughter to tears, be shocked and surprised and walk out the door with a renewed sense of themselves - and maybe a smile.
author: Reba McEntire

title: Get up and dance, get up and smile, get up and drink to the days that are gone in the shortest while.
author: Simon Fowler

title: When I see myself on film it makes me smile, I mean making a good living doing what I enjoy is soo much fun. I just hope that everyone has the chance to enjoy life like I do.
author: Adrienne Barbeau

title: I made a circle with a smile for a mouth on yellow paper, because it was sunshiny and bright.
author: Harvey Ball

title: Acting is a sense of wonder and magic and mystery for me and when life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
author: Andrea Thompson

title: When you walk into a room, a healthy, beautiful smile is incredibly important.
author: Susan Anton

title: Tell me not of joy: there's none Now my little sparrow's gone; He, just as you, Would toy and woo, He would chirp and flatter me, He would hang the wing awhile, Till at length he saw me smile, Lord! how sullen he would be!
author: William Cartwright

title: A smile costs about $240.
author: Roma Downey

title: Oh, the ignorance of us upon whom Providence did not sufficiently smile to permit us to be born in New England.
author: Horace Porter

title: I don't know what I would have done without believing in God. His support gives me power and energy to continue to be optimistic, to smile, not to be depressed. Sometimes, if things are not going so well, I don't cry. I say maybe it's meant to be.
author: Ofra Haza

title: If you want to meet a woman, it's best just to smile and say hi.
author: Karen McDougal

title: As long as you smile, have sparkly eyes and stick your shoulders back, nobody's going to notice your bum or your waist or your feet, for that matter.
author: Cat Deeley

title: When you consider all the stars I have managed, mere submarines make me smile.
author: Charles Frohman

title: If I went to them all dressed up and flashed a nice smile for the cameras it would probably be easier for me to get work. But I just can't tolerate it.
author: Charlie Hunnam

title: Crowds are the most difficult thing for me these days because I have to walk with my head down and my eyes averted. There's still that part of me that wants to hold my head up, make eye contact and smile.
author: Cameron Diaz

title: I love to smile.
author: Inge de Bruijn

title: When life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
author: Andrea Thompson

title: The weaker the country, the stronger the smile.
author: Howard E. Koch

title: In junior high school, I was an object of pure ridicule for my dress, withdrawal, and asocial manner. Dozens of times, I saw individuals laugh and smile more in ten to fifteen minutes than I did in all my life up to then.
author: Arthur Bremer

title: I try to make people smile and dance, not think about things or educate them.
author: Norman Cook

title: I just want to make people smile.
author: Julie Garwood

title: Playing hard to get is not the way to win me over. I'm definitely more for the girl who can smile and laugh all the time and just have a good time!
author: Taylor Lautner

title: You know, there's nothing like seeing the smile on my kids' faces. Laughing together. Playing. It's the best.
author: Mark Wahlberg

title: If you meet a woman in a burqa, she can't reply to your smile. It's a denial of identity.
author: Jean-Francois Cope

title: I don't remember ever deciding to become a performer. I just always was. I began performing by mimicking the performers on the new television that first took the attention away from me as the baby of the household. I continued performing to put a smile on my grandmother's face and always considered her when accepting or declining roles.
author: T'Keyah Crystal Keymah

title: I know virtually no one of my age who can remember a hug, or a smile from their father, or a 'Let's go play football.'
author: Peter Mullan

title: When my time ends, I want people to say, 'Man her music made me smile; it just enlightened my life; it inspired me; it made me feel good every time.'
author: Ledisi

title: When I see people laughing at ideas and companies we have backed, I smile. It means we are going to make a lot of money on that investment.
author: Fred Wilson

title: Ever since I was 2 or 3, I loved to perform for people. I would walk up to another table in a restaurant and crack a joke, sing a song, do a dance, or something entertaining, and the 'audience' would almost always smile and laugh.
author: Maxim Knight

title: I like girls that have a nice smile and nice eyes. I want to date a girl who understands my busy schedule and that I have to be on tour a lot. And she has to make me laugh!
author: Austin Mahone

title: I have my own dance and production companies, and acting is my creative outlet. It's what I'm passionate about. I've actually created a lifestyle where I could act for free. I could get a job to pay the bills and act on the weekends to make me smile.
author: Brian J. White

title: Power doesn't back up in the face of a smile, or in the face of a threat of some kind of nonviolent loving action. It's not the nature of power to back up in the face of anything but some more power.
author: Malcolm X

title: Action is drama. If we cannot make the audience laugh, smile or cry with us, we are not actors.
author: Sonny Chiba

title: When I first came to America, you know, I would look at the newsstands and see the women on the magazine covers. I had never seen anyone smile the way these girls smile! It's like they have nothing to worry about!
author: Anchee Min

title: I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
author: Donald Dunn

title: My favorite books are the ones that make me smile for hours after reading them. I want that for my readers, for the sweetness to linger. Sort of like chocolate, but without the calories.
author: Sarah Addison Allen

title: When I used to wrestle professionally, I preferred being the bad guy known as 'The Heel;' you would get to 'work the crowd,' getting them to hate you and want to see you lose, while the good guy 'Babyface' would walk in, smile and shake hands with a few kids, and his acting job was done.
author: Conan Stevens

title: I spend days on my Xperia logging on Facebook chatting with my friends and family at home; I love listening to Rihanna and Pink and watching movies. Basically, anything that makes me smile, but most of my fans will know that I am always smiling!
author: Dominika Cibulkova

title: I know a lot of aesthetically beautiful women who are not nice people, and they do not come across as beautiful to me. I think the number one thing for beauty is a smile. I love a woman with a beautiful smile.
author: Sara Foster

title: I definitely want to continue working in independent films - and big budget stuff as well - but there's a freedom you have when you're not getting paid. It's easier to say no and there's no pressure to please the powers that be. Also I don't have to hear 'flirt and smile more.'
author: Trieste Kelly Dunn

title: My eyes are different sizes, my nose is too broad at the bridge and squishes up when I laugh, and my lips are sorta funny when I smile.
author: Terry Farrell

title: I know what it's like to be famous. It's good money and it's great fun. A real kick in the pants. People wave at you and smile at you. You get great tables in restaurants. They send you gifts - beautiful clothes and cars.
author: Pierce Brosnan

title: I grew up in a household without a TV. We lived next door to a library for a while, and at one point, I checked out all the books in the fairy tale section. I remember the librarian's quiet smile as I'd bring back one stack and exchange it for another.
author: Victoria Hanley

title: As a former waitress myself, I know firsthand how a simple smile from someone can improve your day and how a single harsh word can destroy it. Being courteous and thoughtful costs you nothing and can sometimes pay you dividends in unexpected ways.
author: Susanna Kearsley

title: If you can't relax during your interview, then nothing you do to prepare will matter. Being yourself is essential to the selection process, and interviewers will feel it if you're too nervous. Showing fear or anxiety appears weak compared to a relaxed smile and genuine confidence.
author: Travis Bradberry

title: Someone asked me the other day what it feels like to see all my 'old stuff' reappearing, at long last, in digital. And I had to smile because to me it doesn't feel like 'old stuff.'
author: Barbara Hambly

title: I was brought up by my father to think that the best thing in life was to be charming, to have a nice smile, always to be liked.
author: Miranda Seymour

title: People want to start their day off with a smile or, better yet, a guffaw.
author: George Takei

title: When men have a smile on their faces, that does a lot for me.
author: Michelle Yeoh

title: I wasn't as used to the new dumb questions, so when men I had once thought of as wise daddies now asked me 'How do you write?' I did not try and spill red wine in their suede pants. I would just smile and say, 'On a typewriter in the mornings when there's nothing else to do.'
author: Eve Babitz

title: I don't hear a lot about elected officials that are men talking about whether they smile a lot. My dad was in elected office my entire life. I don't remember many smiles, and nobody commented about it. He was serious about his job, and so am I.
author: Stephanie Rawlings-Blake

title: Riding Valegro always makes you smile, so I enjoy it.
author: Charlotte Dujardin

title: All the awards in the world, you can get into all the nightclubs, they'll send you the nicest clothes. Nothing better than walking into your dad's restaurant and seeing a smile on his face and knowing that your mom and dad and your sister are real proud of you.
author: Lady Gaga

title: I am happy at Tottenham. I go into work every day with a smile on my face, and that is important.
author: Harry Kane

title: When I'm getting a chance to do my job or make somebody's day, and be on stage where I love, and see all the fans having fun, you can't help but smile.
author: Cole Swindell

title: Unless I can come in in the morning and smile, walk in the lobby and say, 'Good morning!' - if I am stressed - I am not going to do a good job. Everybody is watching us. They are feeding off of our energy.
author: Angela Ahrendts

title: When my lips are dry, I can't smile, I can't talk - it's debilitating!
author: Jessica Jung

title: Clowns are meant to make people smile. That's my goal.
author: Colleen Ballinger

title: I just want to entertain and make people enjoy the game and smile.
author: Dimitar Berbatov

title: Paul Rudd - I wish he was my dad. I wish he was my brother. I wish he was my husband. He's everything to me and puts a smile on my face.
author: Billie Lourd

title: I can be fine and not smile.
author: Greg Oden

title: I don't do anything malicious or anything in a negative manner. I'm all about positivity and making people smile is positive.
author: JaVale McGee

title: For me, I really enjoy helping out the Youth Baseball Academy. That's something that any time you're helping out the game of baseball with at risk children, that puts a smile on my face.
author: Max Scherzer

title: We were expected to smile and be flirty to everyone. But we acted more like a male rock band. We never mastered the niceties. We were more interested in having a good time.
author: Keren Woodward
tags: Good, Time, Having A Good Time
